attributes.action: Save home covert residential care home Doncaster
attributes.additional_details: To stop Doncaster council from changing the use of the Home Covert Residential Care Home at Bentley Doncaster. The council wish to change it's use, meaning that vulnerable residents with learning disabilities will have to find somewhere else to live, this will be extremely traumatic for them and will cause them unnecessary distress. They cannot speak up for themselves so we MUST!
